comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: From the Royal Yacht Squadron, Kirribilli,  Looking NE towards Kurruba Point, Neutral Bay.  ??

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] You're absolutely right. Our vessels curator says: "on the shore opposite is the Manly Ferry base at Neutral Bay & the yacht in the middle foreground has an RSYS flag officer’s burgee flying at the top of the mast... Some sort of regatta or special day is on given the flags on the yachts, maybe even The Forster Cup trophy for the 21s, raced in 1922."
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
